project.name: C-C806A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT07-DF11-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT07-DF11-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Has a buffer declared on the stack. char[64] If input is shorter than 64 it will overflow,due to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C806A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT07-DF11-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Has a buffer declared on the stack. char[64] If input is shorter than 64 it will overflow,due to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

process.environment_variable: Hello World! If this statement isn't more than 64 characters, it will go badly

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
